          text run at (199,59) width 85: "Under CSS1,"
          text run at (199,77) width 45: "the left"
          text run at (5,95) width 471: "floating element should be placed in the upper left corner of the DIV, and"
          text run at (5,113) width 466: "the purple border of the DIV should abut the green border of the floating"
          text run at (5,131) width 59: "element. "
          text run at (63,131) width 382: "Similarly, the right floating element should be placed in the"
          text run at (5,149) width 455: "upper right corner of the DIV, and the purple border of the DIV should"
          text run at (5,167) width 475: "abut the green border of the floating element. The text of the DIV element"
          text run at (5,185) width 428: "should flow between and under the two floating elements. The two"
          text run at (5,203) width 470: "asterisk characters mark the insertion points of the floating elements. It is"
          text run at (5,221) width 474: "expected that, under future specifications, it may be acceptable for the top"
          text run at (5,239) width 444: "of floated elements to align with the top of the line-box following the"
          text run at (5,257) width 475: "insertion point of the floated element to avoid floating elements appearing"
          text run at (5,275) width 342: "before text which precedes it in the source document."

                LayoutImage {IMG} at (5,59) size 15x36 [border: (3px solid #000000)]
                LayoutText {#text} at (157,59) size 733x54
                  text run at (157,59) width 581: " In order to mark these points clearly, an asterisk has been inserted just before each floated"
                  text run at (20,77) width 48: "image. "
                  text run at (67,77) width 657: "If a line has room for a floated image, then the image should float so that its top is aligned with the top"
                  text run at (5,95) width 292: "of the line-box in which the asterisk appears. "
                  text run at (296,95) width 411: "Otherwise, its top should align with the top of the next line-box."
              LayoutBlockFlow {HR} at (28,2429) size 562.25x2 [border: (1px inset #EEEEEE)]
              LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (6,2455) size 490x298 [border: (5px solid #800080)]

                  text run at (199,5) width 56: "This is *"
                LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {P} at (5,5) size 194x88 [bgcolor=#C0C0C0] [border: (1px solid #00FF00)]
                  LayoutText {#text} at (17,17) size 135x54
                    text run at (17,17) width 135: "This is a left-floating"
                    text run at (17,35) width 116: "paragraph (first in"
                    text run at (17,53) width 52: "source)."
                LayoutText {#text} at (254,5) size 13x18
                  text run at (254,5) width 13: " *"
                LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {P} at (291,5) size 194x88 [bgcolor=#C0C0C0] [border: (1px solid #00FF00)]
                  LayoutText {#text} at (17,17) size 144x54
                    text run at (17,17) width 144: "This is a right-floating"
                    text run at (17,35) width 135: "paragraph (second in"
                    text run at (17,53) width 52: "source)."
                LayoutText {#text} at (199,23) size 475x270
                  text run at (199,23) width 69: "text within"
                  text run at (199,41) width 56: "the DIV."
                  text run at (199,59) width 85: "Under CSS1,"
                  text run at (199,77) width 45: "the left"
                  text run at (5,95) width 471: "floating element should be placed in the upper left corner of the DIV, and"
                  text run at (5,113) width 466: "the purple border of the DIV should abut the green border of the floating"
                  text run at (5,131) width 59: "element. "
                  text run at (63,131) width 382: "Similarly, the right floating element should be placed in the"
                  text run at (5,149) width 455: "upper right corner of the DIV, and the purple border of the DIV should"
                  text run at (5,167) width 475: "abut the green border of the floating element. The text of the DIV element"
                  text run at (5,185) width 428: "should flow between and under the two floating elements. The two"
                  text run at (5,203) width 470: "asterisk characters mark the insertion points of the floating elements. It is"
                  text run at (5,221) width 474: "expected that, under future specifications, it may be acceptable for the top"
                  text run at (5,239) width 444: "of floated elements to align with the top of the line-box following the"
                  text run at (5,257) width 475: "insertion point of the floated element to avoid floating elements appearing"
                  text run at (5,275) width 342: "before text which precedes it in the source document."
              LayoutBlockFlow {HR} at (357.83,2761) size 39.34x2 [border: (1px inset #EEEEEE)]

                LayoutText {#text} at (87,5) size 475x216
                  text run at (87,5) width 137: " text within the DIV. "
                  text run at (223,5) width 232: "Under CSS1, the left floating image"
                  text run at (20,23) width 431: "should be placed in the upper left corner of the DIV, and the purple"
                  text run at (5,41) width 444: "border of the DIV should abut the green border of the floating image."
                  text run at (5,59) width 445: "Similarly, the right floating image should be placed in the upper right"
                  text run at (5,77) width 475: "corner of the DIV, and the purple border of the DIV should abut the green"
                  text run at (5,95) width 449: "border of the floating image. The text of the DIV element should flow"
                  text run at (5,113) width 452: "between and under the two floating image. The two asterisk characters"
                  text run at (5,131) width 306: "mark the insertion points of the floating image. "
                  text run at (310,131) width 158: "It is expected that, under"
                  text run at (5,149) width 467: "future specifications, it may be acceptable for the top of floated elements"
                  text run at (5,167) width 455: "to align with the top of the line-box following the insertion point of the"
                  text run at (5,185) width 453: "floated element to avoid floating elements appearing before text which"
                  text run at (5,203) width 226: "precedes it in the source document."
